content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my neighbors house - going home.  saw a light in the sky - thought it could be a star.  stopped to see if it moved - turned out to be a plane ( we have many in our area) something to my left (in the sky) caught my eye - turned out to be (whatever)  it was a huge v shaped vehicle with lighted windows on the outer perimeter (not all were lit).  ran in my house to rouse my husband (he was in the shower) ran back to my neighbors to get my friend. by the time we got back out - the craft was out of sight.  it did not move at a ridiculously high rate of speed (but then, i do not know how high it was).  i just know that it was "huge" and moving from west to east with not all lights on.  i would just like to know if anyone else saw something like this in the night sky on 12/27/2009.
content.summary: Saw a large v shaped object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Left my neighbors house - walking home - saw plane in sky - caught sight of something out of left eye - saw the largest v shaped thing ever- some forward lights lit, some not (huge) cannot say what it was, but would bet it was not terrestial, if that means not of this earth  love to watch the skies, always thought we were alone.  not too sure now.  tried to get my husband to see craft, he was in shower - by time i got back to neighbor, it was gone.
content.summary: Saw a large v shaped object in the sky that flew over head

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:05 pm my friend and i were walking to my car in saint joseph, missouri. he called my attention to two fast moving objects in the sky by the full moon. one was a very bright white leaving a contrail behind. the other was a red light that seemed dimmer but left no contrail. the red one seemed to change course at a high rate of speed and the two flew by each other very closley. i have never seeen things move so fast or glow so bright. this happened over the couse of about 45 seconds to a minute or so.
content.summary: Two obects traveling at a very fast rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Picture from local cam in jupiter florida (jupiter inlet) are they planes, are they helicopters?? i dont know and would like to find out, i have a bunch of these photos. just dont look like planes to me but im not a piolet. the camara is set a 15 second exposure, 1600 iso. if its planes then fine i just wanna know lol... thanks
content.summary: Lights

content.detailedDescription: On the way back from a call while working on duty with the *(possible identifying info about the witness removed--cms/sg) i witnessed a bright object out west that was moving very slowly. when i pulled back into station i took out my video camera to record the object. the object was out west possibly over coral springs or the everglades it moved very slowly untill it finally disappeared behind some buildings. i am also a mufon investigator.
content.summary: Witnessed ufo on way back from call

content.detailedDescription: My husabnd and i were sitting in the drive way in our car smoking a cigarette. he looked over to his right, south west direction and noticed it hovering there. he told me to look, so i did. it looked like a ball of orange light hovering about 500 feet away in the top of the tree line above the mountain. at first thought, it looked like the top of the trees were on fire but it wasnt. we watched it hover there for about 3 minutes. it flashed once and then my husband said it looked it went into "warpspeed". he said it disappeared quick into a small dot. i was extremely excited because this is my first ufo experience! we know it wasnt an air craft of any kind.
content.summary: Big orange ball of light that hovered above the tree line for approximately 3 minutes, flashed once and appeared to be sucked away.

content.detailedDescription:
Took 4 photographs of lunar eclipse while on vacation in chile feb 2008. photos taken at night with digital camera 10x lense and 5 mp.


feb 2008, in chile about 45 minutes south of santiago at wife's family home. group of friends, small gathering in backyard late at night. lunar eclipse scheduled to take place. eclipse took place, i took 4 photographs with my digital camera and put the camera away.

about 2 weeks after getting home, i was reviewing the photos of the moon and noticed a small spec to the right of the moon. i enlarged 4 or 5 times and saw what looked like some type of craft. i have a series of 4 photos, each shifting in shape/direction, but all to the left of the moon. i see a cockpit type shape as part of object, which in my 3rd photo is facing away from the moon, but in the 4th photo is facing towards the moon, indicating movement. i have attached the 4th on the series. i did not notice this "spec" when i took the photos.

i showed these to a photography expert and he said its a helicopter, which i immediately dismissed. i then showed the photos to a local telescope shop owner who could not confirm/explain what he was seeing. he said it was strange and unidentifiable. 

since 2008 i have shown to some friends and family who think photos are amaizing, but i have never followed up with any "professional" group or organization to help me determine what this is.

would like your opinion. this has been bugging me for years.
content.summary: Potential ufo sighting chile feb 2008 during lunar eclipse (night)

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was in the parking lot of scooter's coffee about 30 minutes after a fireworks show at corporate woods.  the exact address the parking lot was :
11106 antioch road
overland park, ks 66210-2420

2.  i was sitting in my car with the windows down with my girl friend and i looked up at the sky because i love looking at the stars at night especially waiting for the traffic to leave the parking lot.

3. at first, i thought i was just seeing another fire work or burning ash from a firework but it was thirty minutes after the show and the light never burned out.

4.  it started about a mile or so north of were i was.  it slowly and i mean really slowly started moving south.  if i could guess how fast it was moving i would say about five to ten miles an hour.  as the ufo for about 10 minutes kept moving slowly south at the same slow speed it then made an exact 90 degree turn east moved about 100 to 200 feet east then made another 90 degree turn back north.  it spent another two minutes going slow back north from which it came and all the sudden it left a warp streak in the sky and was gone.

5.  at first i thought it was just ash but then i felt confused about how this ash never burned out.  then i started to get excited because i have seen two ufo sightings before but never for this long and clear.  i just frustrated afterwards that i didn't bring a camera to document it.  

6.  i lost sight of the ufo when it when into light speed and left a brief orange streak in the air.
content.summary: Orange light ufo sighting on the fifth of july 2010

content.detailedDescription:
I was on mines road about thirty miles north of laredo, texas.
others had seen lights in the sky to our north
i had seen some strange lights in that area about three years ago. 3/26/2008.
so i was looking north twards polares. just below the north star i saw what looked like a jet, white blinking light, flying west. it suddenly turned, very sharp turn, and headed east.
as the "jet ?" turned a very bright white lite came on in what had been the flight path if the "jet ?" had continued west.
once the "jet ?" was heading east a secound bright light came on about 45 degrees to the right and several inches below the first.
the lights were only on for about a secound, they didn't brighten and then fade but came on and went off like a light switch.
while on the lights where about the size around as a pencil veiwed from the end.
i kept watching for a third flash and didn't see were the "jet ?" went.
if it was a jet it was going very fast. as high as it was it looked more like an orbiting satalight.
the turn was very sharp for any kind of jet i,ve ever seen.
content.summary: Two very bright white lights that came on and off in a five secound space.

content.detailedDescription: Pulled out of my garage in my car at 6:42 cst as i proceeded to drive up my neigborhood street, which is normally full of kids and parents at that time but no one was visible anywhere (not that it has any bearing).  as i began driving up my street which is a slight incline i noticed this odd light in the sky to my left above the tree line (glowing oragne/yellow color light) not really moving - airpline traffic can get busy in this area.  initially i just thought it was some sort of manned aircraft but given its odd glowing color, no sound as it was maybe 500' in the air and given it was not moving i got out of my car to take a picture of it with my phone camera which is not very good.  i observed the object begin to move north to northwest of my position and i then telephoned a buddy to tell him what i was seeing.  after maybe 60 seconds a 2nd object appeared from behind the tree line; same color, etc...Everything was the same and it moved above the treeline at about 5:00 relative to the other object and they moved in unison maintaining the same distance.  maybe 15 seconds later a third one appeard moving slowly in the same direction - i was then starting to get an adrenaline rush talking to my buddy and then suddenly maybe 10 seconds later the fourth one appeared.  it too was positioned at 5:00 relative to the third one.  they all moved in unison very slowly towards the north to northwest.  the whole event lasted just less than four minutes as they moved further away from my postion disappearing in the clouds.  all the objects were glowing; there were no flashing lights light on an airplane or helicopter.  i just can't say how big they were.  i'm looking to see if anyone else saw this; no other cars drove by nor did anyone walk by my postion.  i was really hoping someone would drive up - i parked my car in the middle of street with my emergency flashers on because i really wanted someone else to see what i was looking at but to no avail.  i may walk the area this evening to see if anyone else walking in the area may have seen it.  i had a sighting when i was 11 and i was with my brother, mother and grandmother but it was only one object and it didn't look like these.  just curious if anyone else saw this.  it occured over the southwest part of austin and travis county.
content.summary: Observed four objects flying in a pattern over southwest austin that were orange and glowing; moved very slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving out of paradise california toward oroville, down a dark county road, saw a light on the road about a half a mile, but i noticed, it never got closer or further away, so, i turned to my mom, who was driving and asked her if she noticed and i don't remember her response, i don't think she did notice it until i brought it to her attention, but right when i did, all of a sudden, it start coming towards us, and boom, it came right over us, it didn't make a sound, my mother was scared she was squeezing my hand i thought she was going to break it, let's be honest here, i was scared too. then after some time, it finally went directly west, then straight up into the clouds, now, it went directly west from were we were about a good 10-20 miles from were we were then straight up in the clouds all in a matter of two seconds, i never reported it, because i knew, i would be put in the funny farm and committed for life. i only told my family, because my mother was with me. i have never told anyone, except my wife.

this thing when it was over us, made no noise at all, it completely lite up the sky, i looked up at it because my first thought was a helicopter why would a helicopter be out here at this time of night and how in the world was a helicopter maneuvering between all of these trees, that were lining the road, the road we were on, had big trees and they covered the road, so that anything that would fly over it, would surely get caught in them and i couldn't believe it didn't crash into one of them when i realized, it wasn't a helicopter....
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light moving at will

content.detailedDescription: I was bow hunting on a private farm in agency, missouri ( buchanan county )october 5th 2005. i list the time of encounter to be that of approx 1 hour but i would estimate that it was actually longer in retrospect. i was sitting in a fixed position behind a downed tree on the north side of 2 large fields and had a clear view or both, as well a corn silo and farm equipment directly across from me on top of a hill which was approx 500 yards from my location. at approx 4:00 pm i noticed a large thin object approaching the corn silo on the hill. it appeared at that point to be the size of a half dollar at arms length when held horizontally. at that time to me it appeared to be a large military plane heading north towards my location and my view was that of looking at an airplane heading towards me. i resumed my hunting looking for any deer in the area, then with some elapsed time i looked back towards the object,and it was still there and at that point made me somewhat curious because it did not appear to have not progressed towards my location at all. it was one of those moments that you just say hmmmm and i continued my hunting. i scanned the fields and noticed a farmer combining his field on the adjacent property approximately 600 to 700 yards away. i then looked back towards the silo and noticed the craft had advanced a little closer though and appeared to me to be now above the silo and larger then a silver dollar at arms length. i became more interested as being use to seeing aircraft fly by out towards kansas where roscrans air guard is located, i surmised that this was unusual because of the amount of time that had passed and the lack of ground it had covered. it had been approx 15 to 20 minutes at this point and any other aircraft would have flown past sometime ago. the object had my attention now but being the hunter that i am, i did another scan of the fields. when i returned my view to the location of the silo, the object no appeared to sitting in a 45 degree angle over the silo, the object now had my full attention and i did not look away from it again. it remained in this position for for about 15 to 20 minutes, it then slowly righted itself and appeared to go back to its original course and position in the air. i noticed now that it slowly moved away from the silo in a northwesterly direction at the speed of a very very slow moving helicopter. this entire time the object appeared to be as twice the size of a silver dollar held horizontally at arms length. withing approx 8 mins it had worked its way to the top tree line on the southern part of the field i was sitting which was no further then 160 yards, it still appeared as a thick line with no protrusions of any kind on it, as thick as pack of cigarettes held at arms length and very long maybe 100 yards long. it made no noise what so ever no movement of the trees, i took my eyes off it for a second to look over to see if the man on the combine was looking at it but he appeared to be oblivious to it or maybe unable to see it from his location. it continued to move ever so slowly across the tree line and seemed to me to cover approximately 10 to 12 full grown large oak trees at the tops. the object worked its way slowly until it passed right in front of me above the tree line, i still had no idea what it was until it reach my 1 o'clock position still less the 160 yards from me and right above the tree tops, it was gigantic. when it hit my 1 o'clock it rolled up with its belly turning flush towards the north, the only way to describe it was like it was riding up a wave and then going down the wave or like a piece of paper turning up and floating down changing its course to the south. i had an unobstructed up close view of the bottom of this object. it was a perfect long triangle like that of a slice of pizza, dull grey metal not shiny at all. on the bottom it was covered in evenly spaced symmetrical dull white globe lights that appeared to me to look like dull white halves of a globe but much much larger. i could not get an exact count of the lights because because i was in awe at what i was looking at so to speak. i would say around 9 lights that filled the whole bottom of the craft in uniformity. after turning its belly up to the north floated ever so slowly to the south and then west following the tops of the trees until it moved away from and appeared to move back behind the trees some ways off. i have never in my life seen anything like this before and have not seen anything like this since. i have since moved from missouri, but the owners of the property have told me they too have seen this craft a cpile different times during the night flying over the fields and at one time shinning a light like a beam onto the field.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Dull grey pizza slice shaped triangle viewed for 1 hour or more

content.detailedDescription: i was looking out thru my front door window,and seen what at first glance seemed to be an unusually bright light i first considered it to possibly be an airplane i fixated the object at a point in the window pane i was looking thru,not seeing any movement iconsidered it to somehow perhaps be a star,however it seemed rather large and too bright as well as being seemingly close for a star. after viewing for approx. 5 min i finally seen some planes  in the distance to relate to this object, they were clearly airplanes  higher than the object further south with blinking red lights and they were moving unlike the object that was stationary in comparison.I went to my computer to see if i could find any news of this sighting 5 min later clouds had rolled in sky became daylight and nothing else to report other than my sighting was in the southeastern view from my vantage point,prior to looking out and viewing this object i had awaken and was watching television,i did'nt see movement or description other than bright light,i felt as if i was seeing something highly unusual and i could'nt help but wonder if the planes i saw also could be viewing this object from their location and proximity,afterwards i called a friend to tell her about it she was somewhat freaked out but certainly beleived my sighting to be more than a star or anything either of us have an explanation for.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: Was talking on the phone to a friend when i looked to the northern horizon and saw what looked to be a plane in the distance other than it was cloudy and it was flying very low the closer it got the more i realized it was not a plane or a helicopter and as it approached to fly directly over my house i saw two blue lights shot from both sides of the craft in opposite directions and disappeared then after i saw that and it was directly about my head i saw the shape in perfect detail that it was a dark or black color and was in a perfect sphere shape and the craft had an amber colored light (just one singular light and was not blinking it was a continuous light) the flight path from beginning of sighting to that last know direction was due south the changed coarse to south southeast then changed coarse back to directly south after its last coarse change to south it shot out of sight with extreme acceleration and speed. the feelings i had during the sighting was at first didn't think much of it then as i could make out that it was a normal plane or helicopter i started to feel excited at first then felt a feeling of fear because it was right above my house moving at a very slow rate of speed the whole time was watching it the feelings after the event i feel very confused and don't understand what i could have seen other then a ufo because conventional aircraft this thing was not
content.summary: Sphere shaped object with an consistent not blinking amber light silent while seen and flown over head then moved at great speed

content.detailedDescription:
It was a really windy day and i figured i would film the dead tree out front incase it fell. but after filming for a short duration, something caught my eye to the north north east and i quickly began to film it. it was spherical in shape and white in color. this was at around 4 pm us central time.

the footage can be found here:  *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

i'll also include a still frame (slightly enhanced with brightness ect)
content.summary: Filming dead tree to the north east when i spotted a strange object

content.detailedDescription: i was out on my front stoop at 7:30pm talking on my cell phone with a guy about refinancing my mortgage before the rates get too high. just as we were winding up the conversation, i hear a pop to my left about 100 feet away. i thought someone had shot off a firecracker. as i looked, i saw something float up from behind some trees up the side of the building. it shimmered and my initial impression was that it was a dud firecracker. i'm continuing my conversation on the phone and this thing floats towards me over the roof of the building diagonally across the parking lot from me. i'm thinking "how strange" because there is no wind and it shimmers. i'm still on the phone but not really listening to the mortgage guy. as it gets over me, it looks just like a jelly fish with red blinking lights and a shimmering silver outline. it is tumbling end over end and the lights are on the inside of this thing. i think if it had been daylight with no lights i would not have seen it because it was so fragile looking. i don't know how big it was or how high because i am a poor judge of distance when it comes to looking up in the sky. i think it must have been relatively small and low but i'm not sure if that was just an optical illusion because after it floated over the roof i thought it was a clear plastic bag????  i don't know exactly what to call the thing except that it looked like a flying jelly fish or amoeba. i ball parked the experience as lasting maybe 10 minutes, i don't even think it was that long. this thing moved like it was rolling along the bottom of a creek, it followed a straight line, like you see some jellyfish do on the ocean floor when they are caught in a current and flip end over end. it flew over the cedar tree at the corner of my building then out towards the dam and river where it disappeared from my view. i didn't follow behind the buildings to see it since it is dark back there and it would have been out of sight by the time i got to the open bluff behind my condo to see it. it was going in a northeasterly direction. i wasn't frightened just kind of, "i really don't want to be seeing this". it was not nearly as dramatic as the incident we had out here on 09/26/2009, which i also reported to mufon, but i did get a good visual this time.
content.summary: Amoeba or jellyfish like

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside of my garage and looked into the sky (had a feeling i might see a balloon) and sure enough i saw what i thought was a balloon (the aliens often appear to me as balloons or balls of light that resemble balloons)but when i put them on the computer and enlarged the photo's they looked more like a v, albeit a sideways one. so i decided to post 'em
 i don't bother to post my observations very often because they usually look like balloons, and if i tell people they talk to me in my mind ... well then i'm a schizophrenic.
i always wanted to meet aliens and i got my wish. unfortunately i don't think they like me.
content.summary: Thought it was another balloon, that how the aliens usually appear to me

content.detailedDescription: Was actually my son and his 2 friends who saw it.By the time i came out it was gone.I was actually wondering if anyone else reported it.From their description it was a sphere shaped object with a yellow ring around it.It was approximately as high as a commercial jet in the sky.They said it moved slow at first from the north and moved south.As it got directly over them they said it pulsated as it continued moving slowly south then it just shot off at a high rate of speed to the south.They also said it made no sound what so ever.The whole event lasted approx 5 min.The thing that made me curious is that theyre all 9 yrs old and have no reason to lie.Especially my son.He knows not to lie and they all gave the same description of the event when i asked them individually.They were all emphatic and excited.Just wondering if anyone else saw this and curious as to what it was.Thanks for any info u can give me
content.summary: Sphere object pulsating then shot off

content.detailedDescription:
To whomever keeps posting these comments about another sighting.

the mufon cms system is not a forum. it is for reporting unusual events and phenomena and nothing else.

if you wish to make comments about a particular report, please visit http://www.Mufoncentral.Com

or

send an email to hq@mufon.Com.

mufon investigators are quite adept at spotting hoaxes and misidentifications, regardless of how silly they may seem.

please refrain from further comments as they will also be removed.

thank you

terry groff
deputy director of investigations
content.summary: What is happening here ?

content.detailedDescription:
This past weekend i was in vegas at sam boyd stadium for the irb 7's tournament.  during the afternoon matches i glanced up to the sky and was dumbfounded by three circular objects flying in a "v" formation moving to the ne.  the objects had the afternoon sun reflection so they appeared to be white.  i watched them curiously as they were travelling at a high rate of speed. they continued passing through the sky and suddenly one object moved directly north with the other two remaining in formation.  the objects soon became out of sight and i continued watching the match.  i was questioned by one of my friends as to what i was looking at and i told him.  he was unable to focus on them as the objects left my sight.  my only thought was that it was an odd occurance.  i immediately thought of the many things it could have been including baloons being caught in the wind however the tight formation couldnt explain that nor could the movement of one of the objects moving directly and abrubtly north keeping the high rate of speed.  i continued watching the match, glancing occassionaly upward.  approximately 30 seconds to a minute later one object perfectly matching the previous description travelled in the complete opposite direction at the same high rate of speed.  my theory of the wind carrying a baloon was immediately shot.  i attempted to point out the object to my friends but the speed was so great they had no idea what to look for.  that was it.  

i realize there could be many explanations to this but to me it met the definition of unidentified flying object simply because i have no idea what it was. aircraft were flying in the sky the entire day but nothing close to what i have described.  i would greatly appreciate an identification should one be confirmed.
content.summary: 3 objects flying in formation in vegas one returned

content.detailedDescription: My family and i returned home from school/the grocery store, and as i was getting groceries from the car and taking them into the house, i looked up at the stars, like i always do.  i am a lover of the night sky, and it draws me.  as i was grabbing a bag of groceries, i noticed an odd star that started moving at a constant speed and moving directly upward.  it moved almost like the speed of a plane, but it was just a star (or so i thought at the time).  however it moved upward in a straight line.  it was too high up and quiet to be a helicopter and it moved too much against the earths rotation to be a satellite. i watched the light move upward for about 30 or 40 seconds then headed in to drop off the groceries.  when i came back out to get more bags, about ten seconds or less later, the light was gone.  i looked all over and couldn't find anything moving in the sky.  i thought it was odd, because at the speed it was moving, ten seconds later i would still have been able to see it.  i had always been curious about ufos, but that night i was certain.
content.summary: Oddly moving light that disappeared rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
I have been fascinated by ufo's most of my adult life and was watching a couple of washington dc cams over the weekend and captured these objects from different cams.

i have no idea what they are and i am by no means stating that they are ufo's but i know there is a no-fly zone over the white house and nearby areas and wondering if anyone knows what these objects could be.

note: these cams are refreshed every 10 to 15 mins so they represent only a moment in time.
content.summary: Wash dc webcam shots over 2/13-2/14  2011

content.detailedDescription: I went outside and i glanced over at guildford cathedral (highest point in the town) and saw a black disc with orange lights that flashed. it wasn't any vehicle that was human it was definately something alien. i thought it would do something but it seemd like it was just scanning the area, we are quite close to london so that's maybe the reason it came to guildford. it was there for about 30 seconds then it went ftl back out from the atmosphere. this was my first encounter and it was frightening but amazing at the same time.
content.summary: Hovering over cathedral,

content.detailedDescription:
While driving north on 96th street somewhere between port sheldon and filmore street (i think between baldwin and bauer) with a passenger witness we observed from my vehicle, which i was driving, lights moving in a circular fashion.  the lights were slightly to the north and west of our location.  i would estimate them to be 3-500 feet in teh air.  the lights appeared to move in a manner similar to a multi light spotlight used to draw attention to a community event; as if the spotlights were on the underside of clouds.  however the evening was not cloudy.  at first i thought the lights were indeed a spotlight.  

the lights at first moved in a manner as if around the circumfrence of an oval or circle.  the lights then began to criss-cross within the circle.  the lights then then turned multicolored (i can not exactly recall teh colors, but my memory indicates they were blue, red/orange and green.  then 4-beams of light were pointed towards the ground as if to create a 4-sided upside down pyramid.  the lights then moved very rapidly around the circumfrance of the oval/circle again.  this shape lasted no more than 5 seconds.  the pyramid them inverted and stretched very high into the sky such that it appeared to be only one beam of light.  at this point i disticntly remember saying "the colors of the rainbow".  my passenger and i were then holding hands, my right and his left.  at some point during the process i commented with excitment to him.

the light apex of the pyramid stretched very high such that it now appeared to be only a single beam of light and appeared only as white light.  the light beam flashed and bent about 2/3 of the way up the light beam.  the bend in the light appeared to be about a 60-degree angle and moved to the north west sky and it was gone.

the event was sureal.  i travel to a party that was wrapping up near the college campus of grand valley state and my passenger and i told several persons.  i was so shocked i called the ottawa county sheriff.  the desk sargent laughed at me so i hung up.

i have tried to estimate the height of the light beam and also the distance the actual pyramid was from out car.  i had difficulty with it at the time, but best estimate was that it originated about .25-.5 miles from our road of travel.  as for the total height of the light beam - it could have been several miles, i just could not tell.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights only - rotating multicolored lights stretching to high triangle colors of rainbow light bend and flash at bend point

content.detailedDescription: Ok saw more lights yay, was awesome ..Heres an idea ..And field investigators close to abilene area? got a good camera? i don't i managed to get them on my camera a little tonight for the first time. lights did some really cool displays tonight. i bet you if one of you investigators came out here to film them ohhh lets say tomorrow night you'll be amazed at the lights. 100% sure these aren't flares. anyways i'll leave it up to you guys, heres another report to go into your files of whatever. im sure reports are good but some witnesses would be better and some footage would be a bonus. come out here take a look for yourself.
content.summary: More lights

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i was watching tv and i heard something very unusual in this area of the hill country near bandera tx. we arent in any flight plan and never see jets fly over here. the sound was like a commercial jet flying low. at first i thought it was plane crashing. i muted the tv to hear it better. it lasted about 1 minute then went quiet. then got loud again so i went outside to look expecting to see an explosion or something. i didn't so i looked up and saw this light in the sky moving horizontally then it did a sharp 180 and as it turned back,i saw a rounded side gray colored reflecting off the moon kinda looked partially invisable or "cloaked" and then it went straight up. i could only see it going up a short time must have went into the clouds. the whole time i could hear a really loud jet sounding engine which got quieter as it ascended into the sky. i noticed in all the other posts nobody reported hearing anything.The only way i can explain the sound is it was like sitting at the end of a runway with jet flying over you.
when i saw it shoot straight upwards i was saying , "oh my god" over and over and started feeling like i just saw god or something. it was very exciting! my husband came out when i was yelling oh my god!! he didnt see the light but he could hear the loud sound and still cant explain it. we both listened for about another minute till it was gone.
content.summary: Ufo sighting with loud jet like engine sound

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunny clear day i was out in the yard watering the grass when i heard a dove on the powerline i looked up at the bird and at first glance i saw what seemed to be a nat flying near it's head then notticed it was much farther away. i marked the ground with my foot and looked to see what direction it was going i then ran in the house to get the camcorder. i went to the same spot that i made. it took a little bit to find but when i did and zoomed in it was clear that it was a black wing-boomerang shaped object. i watched it as it went in differnt directions and switched the camcorder in differant modes negative art ect. it also looks to have a glow around it.
content.summary: Black  boomerang  changes  shape

content.detailedDescription: I work in ems and after a call while me and my partner were getting our ambulance cleaned up. i stepped away to have a cigarette, and wandered away from where the ambulance was. i was smoking and looking up at the stars. the san leandro hills are the background with the sun getting ready to rise, the sky was begining to change colors. i though i noticed a star moving, i looked at another bright star in the general area and confirmed that it was in deed moving. it was moving at a slow pace i thought it was a satellite, then it changed direction from south to east which was odd. we finished up and were leaving the area, i took one last glance at it and it looked as if the object was descending behind the hills. there were two airplanes in the sky at the time both were headed southward behind where the object was located.
content.summary: Star like object flying southward in the early am.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my first report on the sightings here in golden valley. it is a regular occurrence and because of the reports that someone else has made on the area i decided to report as well.
this has been happening out here for years! me and my wife have lived in golden valley now for about 10 yrs and it's always the same, amber colored silent orbs going across the sky, usually north west to south east.
recently in the south east we have been seeing reddish orange orbs dancing above the hualapai mtn range's. i'm judging it's the hualapai's but am unsure.

the sighting's are random but when they occur they are in the same area, always. "shimmering" best describes their behavior.
one will show then more will appear either to the side or above the first one.
this time one appeared above the others and in a "domino effect" type of display two or three rose diagonally upward then faded out. 

it's almost as if they materialize individually then fade out but that they are all part of the same group.
it rang a bell about the couple that were coming from las vegas to phoenix on hwy 93 seeing the same objects to the south east, very interesting.

for some reason golden valley is having a flap.
i will document what i can and report when i can.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shimmering reddish orange orb's in the south east.

content.detailedDescription: Well i thought because of the rain they may not be back. but i kept the search up just the same an finally after an exhausting search located 2 almost hidden in a small canyon virtually hidden next to the hualapai mtn range on the kingman side. there was no orbs this time that i could see an however i finally got some credible footage to document the event from the start where i found them all the way to the trip upwards to the heavens. all 3 used the mesa across the valley from me to make their exit. sorta like their launch pad. these are again the same as the previous nights, flashing bubble gum machine lights on top but again, only 3 this time much to my dismay. an they must have a way to communicate with each other from far away as the first two left one after the other an it wasnt till an hour an a half later the 3rd one appeared an had to have been working the northeast side of the valley because that are is beyond my scope reach an i didnt notice it until later when it went to go up to the heavens after the other 2. since they were in an entirely different part of the valley its my belief that its 2 choices, either their mining something that we don't see or their looking for something. but the fact they were located in a not very busy part of the valley an few houses but yet they were right on the outskirts of kingman township. an it could be purely an observation mission but for the fact the terrain they were in was rather obscure to see much that they havent already seen from above. an they were at one point near the summit of the mtns. yet they chose to remain away from the airport an the lights? so my thoughts are they are mining or gathering some strange energy source that we have yet to discover. an then same as the previous night's, they took off. i tried to stay awake long enough to see where they were picked up in the stratosphere at but i was too tired and plus the cloud cover was scattered so the viewing ceiling was under 10k ft. (i'm estimating) i'm going to keep up the same vigil tonight an again hopefully bring more light on the subject matter but its been the same routine except different part of the valley. jim, i do have video this time!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Finally they came in from the other side of the vallley but only 3
